Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{3: "Outside the main venue, there's a separate recreation area set up for visiting guests."}
{3: 'You were planning to take a short break, until you spot Rosetta locked in an intense card duel with a mechanoid.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Onlooking Crowd', 3: "Whoa! The mechanoid rolled a 6! Rosetta's in trouble now.", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Card-Playing Mechanoid', 3: "According to this card's effect, Rosetta must roll a dice. If she rolls lower than my 6, she'll take 6,000 damage and lose this round.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Card-Playing Mechanoid', 3: 'Based on prior match data with Rosetta, her current chance of winning is less than 5%.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Don't be so sure about that!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Under everyone's watchful gaze, Rosetta rolls the dice. It spins across the table several times and settles on a 1."}
{3: 'She looks clearly frustrated by the loss and seems ready to challenge the mechanoid for another round.'}
{2: "How's the score looking today?", 3: '27'}
{3: 'The moment she hears your voice, she glances over for help, but embarrassment flashes across her face.'}
{3: 'The card-playing mechanoid butts in and announces the tally as if showing off.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Card-Playing Mechanoid', 3: 'Match record: Mechanoid 5, Rosetta 0.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Luck's not on your side today, huh?", 3: '38', 4: 'Just an off day?', 5: '38'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'You know me, 【kuroname】... my luck has never been great.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Still want another round?', 3: '41'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I need at least one win. Otherwise the Engineering Force will tease me forever.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You've got this, Rosetta!", 3: '44'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yeah, 【kuroname】! This time I'm winning.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Card-Playing Mechanoid', 3: 'Rosetta has repeated that line four times with zero success.', 4: '1'}
{3: "After the trash-talk ends, they both roll dice to see who goes first. Unsurprisingly, Rosetta's 2 loses to the mechanoid's 4."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Card-Playing Mechanoid', 3: "Based on previous data, Rosetta's chance of winning after losing the first move is only 0.37 percent.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hey! How did you come up with 0.37 percent?', 3: '56', 4: '?', 5: '56'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Ignore him. With your cheers, and your luck...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She looks at the cards in her hand, then shoots you a look full of resolve.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'll win!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I believe you, but you might be tempting fate.', 3: '63'}
{3: "Even with your support, luck still won't smile on Rosetta."}
{3: "The mechanoid's early defense blocks every attack, and her life points are barely flickering, like a candle in the wind."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Card-Playing Mechanoid', 3: 'If Rosetta fails to win this turn, my chance of victory next turn becomes one hundred percent.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "So I really can't win...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'm sorry, 【kuroname】. It looks like I'm breaking my promise.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She turns to you, helplessness clouding her face.'}
{2: "Don't lose heart. We still have one last draw.", 3: '78', 4: "The battle isn't decided yet.", 5: '78'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The odds are just too slim...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Exactly. Won't the victory taste better this way?", 3: '81'}
{2: "Mechanoid, what are Rosetta's odds now?", 3: '83'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Card-Playing Mechanoid', 3: 'Rosetta? Win probability? Still... 0.37 percent.', 4: '1'}
{2: "See? Even at rock bottom, our odds haven't dropped.", 3: '87'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watching your calm, confident expression, Rosetta recalls the "miracles" you\'ve pulled off before. For a moment, she forgets how tiny 0.37 percent really is.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "(If luck can change anything, it's probably 【kuroname】's luck that can turn this around.)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'For the next draw, Rosetta and I will pull together. No rule against that, right?', 3: '92'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Card-Playing Mechanoid', 3: "If Rosetta agrees, I have no objection. Note: Her win rate will not increase because of 【kuroname】's participation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, we know.', 3: '96', 4: 'Ready, Rosetta?', 5: '96'}
{3: "You and Rosetta place your hands on the tiny deck. Your confidence blows away her doubt; whatever happens, she's eager to see what card you'll draw together."}
{1: '1', 2: '【kuroname】 & Rosetta', 3: "With this draw, we'll turn it all around!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiColorTableStageMain/FxUiColorTableStageRollStarLoop.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Rosetta slips the new card into her hand. You watch her tense expression soften, as if the card is shining inside her visual module.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiColorTableStageMain/FxUiColorTableStageRollStarLoop.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'We can win. This will do it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid has never encountered this card in any previous duel with Rosetta, so it has no counter ready.'}
{3: "Thanks to the card you drew together, all of its moves are sealed. Now is Rosetta's perfect window to strike back!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Now it's my turn to attack!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieDao.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieDao01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "The mechanoid's earlier lockdown had trapped several cards in Rosetta's hand. She unleashes them in a dazzling flurry."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieDao.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieDao01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Cards flash in and out of play until the entire enemy defense is wiped. Then she summons enough power to zero out its life points.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiChopping03.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "The combined strike drives the mechanoid's life to zero. Rosetta has seized that 0.37 percent chance and turned the duel on its head!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Phew... That was a tough win, thanks to you, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We drew that card together.', 3: '144'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: '【kuroname】, do you remember this card?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'This card... looks somewhat familiar.', 3: '147'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'This is the one you told me to include back when I built the deck. Never thought your pick would be the key to my comeback today, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Right, now I remember.', 3: '149'}
{3: 'For a heartbeat, the scene blurs. A memory surfaces: you and Rosetta in the Engineering Force maintenance room long ago.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: "This card looks powerful. Why haven't you added it to your deck, Rosetta?", 3: '156'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Since when did you care about card games, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "The effect is strong, but it clashes with my deck's style. Drawn at the wrong time, it is dead weight.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'But what if you draw it at the perfect moment?', 3: '161'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Then it could very well decide the match... but that window is extremely narrow.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why not keep one copy anyway? Call it my wish for you to pull off a miracle when things look hopeless.', 3: '163'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 4: "Since it carries your blessing, I'll hold on to it.", 5: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: '【kuroname】, 【kuroname】...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1030.jpg'}
{3: "The Construct's voice pulls you back to the present card table."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'What are you thinking?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I was thinking the Engineering Force can't tease you anymore.", 3: '177', 4: 'Feel like playing more? We can go together.', 5: '179'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'No way, 1-5 is still awful. I need the score in my favor.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "With your luck and my skill, we'll claw it back for sure!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{3: 'You duel the mechanoid together until the streetlights come on. The final tally: Rosetta 6, Mechanoid 5. Pleased at last, she stands and leaves by your side.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: '【kuroname】, check this out.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Walking side by side down the now-quiet street, Rosetta hands you the card that turned the tide.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'How did you know we could claw this back when the odds were so low?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Because it wasn't zero. I chose to believe first and leave the rest to luck.", 3: '193'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I never expect much from my luck... and the card has strict use conditions, so I only kept one copy even though you suggested it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Honestly, if you hadn't drawn that card, I might have forgotten it was there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'My luck is terrible, yet I always cling to tiny hopes. ', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Turns out the card was meant for you—only someone truly lucky could pull it at the perfect moment.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'But you did keep one copy.', 3: '201'}
{2: "Next time, trust yourself a little more, whether it's luck or something else.", 3: '202'}
{2: 'Besides, we drew it together. I just believed a bit more...', 3: '203'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Believe what?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Believed we would win, and that the card would answer our hope.', 3: '206'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'That is so like you, 【kuroname】. If it were just you versus that mechanoid, the match would have been so easy.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Even with luck on my side, I still needed your skill. One person alone could not have done it.', 3: '209', 4: 'Have some faith in yourself, Rosetta. You were essential to our victory!', 5: '209'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "So I'm really one of the ingredients for victory? Thank you, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But we've been winning ever since we teamed up. I'm curious, are you always this lucky, 【kuroname】? Let's test it! I shuffled. Draw again!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's the same card again! You're cheating, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not at all. Just lucky, I swear.', 3: '217'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Is it really just luck?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yes and no. Meeting you, Rosetta—that's luck in action.", 3: '220'}
{2: 'But also because I believed I would meet you someday, I was certain of it.', 3: '221'}
{3: 'You look at her earnestly. Under the dim streetlamp, even the blush on her cheeks feels intoxicating.'}
{3: "With shy courage, she meets your gaze. The knight's smile seems to hold the lingering warmth of daylight."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'No wonder. Looks like you used up all my luck.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Promise me: if I ever need you to return a little of it, you won't say no.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I won't. And when you need me, come find me too.", 3: '232'}
